content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is EPAM's enterprise social network. Available both on mobile and desktop, this tool connects you with the people and information across your organization: use Yammer to be in touch with the whole EPAM, as well as grow professionally.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Look through the quick presentation to know how to make the most of Yammer and download it if necessary:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":941771,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/575c1dd0-cabe-423d-9014-faf2a18e1dab/Yammer_newcomers_module 2020,2021.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/575c1dd0-cabe-423d-9014-faf2a18e1dab/Yammer_newcomers_module 2020,2021.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Yammer_newcomers_module 2020,2021.pdf\",\"name\":\"Yammer_newcomers_module 2020,2021.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"575c1dd0-cabe-423d-9014-faf2a18e1dab\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6318,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/58ab5aa7-9285-4bc9-9226-59f150c99b02/yam.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/58ab5aa7-9285-4bc9-9226-59f150c99b02/yam.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"yam.PNG\",\"name\":\"yam.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"58ab5aa7-9285-4bc9-9226-59f150c99b02\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":712,\"height\":92},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
